metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9536 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
tools/tiff2pdf.c in libtiff 4.0.6 has out-of-bounds write vulnerabilities in heap allocated buffers in t2p_process_jpeg_strip(). Reported as MSVR 35098, aka "t2p_process_jpeg_strip heap-buffer-overflow."

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9536` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
libtiff-tools - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
libtiff5 - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: tyhicks> Rating as low since the flaw is in the tools rather than the library mdeslaur> same commit as CVE-2016-9533

criterions.comment: tiff package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1').
